title: Peer-Supported Surgical Skill Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of operating room environments
context.additional_context: Peer mentoring system combining smartphone-based video learning with offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Capable of performing operating room safety protocols (WHO Checklist) with 90% accuracy
Apply suturing techniques (continuous/interrupted/vertical mattress) on actual models with 85% accuracy
Complete surgical preparation (scrubbing, gown/glove donning) within 5 minutes based on peer feedback
Replicate local anesthesia procedures in a simulated environment following standard guidelines

resources: Surgical training kits (suturing materials, synthetic tissue)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
